title: aden + anais Baby Boy or Girl Kimono Bodysuit, Baby Side Snap Onesie, Super Soft Cotton Muslin Coverall
features: BABY BOY OR GIRL KIMONO BODYSUIT: Dress your baby boy or girl in the aden + anais Onesie Kimono. This short sleeve bodysuit is designed with a v-neck, bottom and side snaps. The fabric is lightweight, breathable, and comfortable.

EASY-DRESS ONESIE: We know that most babies do not enjoy a shirt being pulled over their heads. We’ve designed this onesie kimono with side and front bottom snaps making it easy to dress, undress, and quickly change diapers.

BREATHABLE, STRETCHABLE FABRIC: This v-neck bodysuit is created with 95% cotton muslin and 5% spandex for a one-way stretch that will move with your baby. The muslin’s open weave allows airflow, reducing the risk of overheating.
MACHINE WASHABLE: This baby onesie is machine washable, please follow the special care instructions included. It will stay soft and maintain its slight stretch wash after wash.

aden + anais: From breathability and natural give to softness and durability, the benefits of aden + anais muslin baby-clothes give you complete assurance that you are doing the best thing for your baby’s comfort. The word-of-mouth buzz our signature muslin products continue to create among parents, nurses, pediatricians, industry experts, lactation consultants and celebrities alike is a testament to the comfort our products provide to both baby and parent.
description: aden + anais has taken their obsession with muslin to the next level with an adorable line of breathable baby clothing. By adding a touch of spandex to their natural cotton muslin; they created a super comfy fabric that moves with baby while helping reduce the risk of overheating. This long sleeve kimono body suit makes dressing baby a cinch because you won't have to pull anything overhead when putting it on or taking it off. Plus; just like aden + anais' other muslin products; it's machine washable and stays soft wash after wash.

title: Introducing baby clothes by aden + anais!
